Metal: Recycle in the metal bin. Clean before recycling.
Glass: Recycle in the glass bin. Avoid sharp edges.
Biological: Compost organic waste or dispose in the biodegradable bin.
Paper: Recycle clean paper. Do not recycle wet or soiled paper.
Battery: Hazardous waste! Do NOT throw in trash. Drop at e-waste collection centers.
Trash: General waste. Cannot be recycled. Dispose in the trash bin.
Cardboard: Flatten cardboard boxes and place in the recycling bin.
Shoes: Donate wearable shoes. Otherwise, dispose in textile recycling bins.
Clothes: Donate usable clothes. Otherwise recycle via textile recycling programs.
Plastic: Recycle plastics labeled 1, 2, or 5. Avoid burning or landfilling.
